quickpsy fits psychometric functions for several conditions. The package is 
still under construction. 

## Install

Install the package devtools

```R
install.packages("devtools")
```

and then 

```R
devtools::install_github("danilinares/quickpsy")
```

## Example

```R
data(quickpsydat)
fit <- quickpsy(quickpsydat, FASE, RESP,
                between = .(ECC, INTERVAL, obs), B = 100)
plotcurves(fit)
plotpara(fit)
plotthresholds(fit)
```

## Tutorials

```R
browseVignettes('quickpsy')
```
